snippet.title: The Slaverian Trucker - Teaser
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1822450/The_Slaverian_Trucker/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/theslaveriantrucker
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FrankBudai
Discord: https://discord.gg/ZvqjZwbnHD
Email: thewastelandtrucker@gmail.com

The Slaverian Trucker is a Survival/Truck/Life simulator game. Make enough money to survive and expand your wealth in the harsh semi-post apocalyptic lands of Slaveria, doing legal and illegal work, while maintaining, fixing, building, repairing, tuning your trucks, cars and other vehicles.
